title: President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 28, 2009

 



President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                       June 28, 2009    President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday   WASHINGTON, D.C. - This Wednesday, July 1, President Barack Obama will hold a national discussion on health care through an online town hall meeting in Annandale, Virginia. In addition to the live audience, questions will come from online communities such as Facebook, YouTube and Twitter. For more information go to: /blog/A-National-Discussion-on-Health-Care-Reform/    Additional details on media coverage will be released as they become available. ###
